text: Make that two rings for Justin Verlander. The Houston Astros ace, fresh off a 2017 World Series victory, wed model Kate Upton on Saturday in Italy. Upton wore in a white dress with lace sleeves and had her hair in a side part with loose waves and a veil pinned in the back, an eyewitness told E! News, Verlander wore a dark tux with a bow tie and bridesmaids wore different blush colored gowns. I feel so lucky that I got to marry my best friend!! @ justinverlander Thank you to our family and friends for making this weekend so fun and magical! ( @ ktmerry ) A post shared by Kate Upton ( @ kateupton ) on Nov 6, 2017 at 7 : 35am PST The wedding took place
